attributes.action: prohibit the wearing of face covering religious clothing in banks etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that no-one should be allowed to cover their face in banks, shops etc for security reasons. Also anyone going through passport control should be required to show their face before being allowed to board a plane.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
